reviewText: Unfortunately, this 1996 film has not been released in American format.  Made for television by UPN, it was the pilot for a series which never went into development.  The film is a coming-of-age story set in the far future.  In the midst of an interplanetary conflict, inexperienced cadets are suddenly thrust into actual combat.  With their senior officers killed in action and a colony threatened, they must engage enemy ships against the odds.  The enemy does not consist of aliens but of humans from an authoritarian society, which makes the story something of a metaphor for the Cold War.  There is nothing here that has not been done many times before.  In fact, the script draws heavily from Top Gun and Star Wars.  However, the film is visually impressive and well-directed, making it quite entertaining.
Please, please put this out in US format.  Really enjoyed this film.

I ENJOYED THIS VIDEO GREATLY BUT YOU COULD SEE A SLIGHT DEGRADATION IN THE DVD FILM QUALITY. I HAVE THIS MOVIE IN VHS FORMAT AND I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS TO COME ON BLUE RAY FORMAT. THE ONLY REGRET IS THAT IT WAS NOT PUT OUT IN REGION 1 (USA)  VERSION.
